data.text: Ala naxan gbeeɲɔxɔ tiin na, Alatala,
Dunuɲa kitisana, keli,
Alatala, muxu ɲaxine luma ɲaxanɲɛ
Fe ɲaxi rabane e yɛtɛ matɔxɔma kanba falane yi.
Alatala, e bata i ya muxune yigbɛtɛn.
E kaɲa gilɛne nun kiridine nun xɔɲɛne faxama.
E yi a fala, e naxa,
Ɛ a liga ɛ yeren ma
Ala naxan en tunle rafalaxi,
A tan naxan siyane birin xuruma,
Alatala muxune miriyane kolon,
Alatala, sɛwan na kanna xa
I matabun fi a ma tɔrɔ lɔxɔne yi,
Alatala mi a muxune rabeɲinma,
Kitine mɔn sama nɛn tinxinni,
Nde tiyɛ n xɔn muxu ɲaxine xili ma?
Xa Alatala mi yi n mali nun,
N to yi a falama, n naxa,
N na kuisan,
I mako mi kitisa tinxintarene ma,
E e malanma tinxin muxune xili ma,
Koni Alatala bata findi n ma faran makantanxin na.
A e hakɛne saranma e ra nɛn.
